## RecordClass.unset() method

Returns a copy of the current object without the specified properties

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unset(...keys: OptionalPropsOf<Props>[]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keys | [OptionalPropsOf](./paratype.optionalpropsof.md)<!-- -->&lt;Props&gt;\[\] | Name of properties that shall be removed |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

## Remarks

Only optional properties can be unset.

If the resulting object would be equal to the current instance, then the current instance is returned instead.
